Articles.Content:
Which is not actually a hill. Anyways while Jebediah was scouting for a landing site on Mun when he saw this big arc-ish rock on the surface, He landed his 1-kerbal lander 6km from it.

Since he did not feel like walking that distance he contacted his fellow kerbals. Geoffrid landed a 4-kerbal mun base close to Jebediah and the arc. So they had a place to live waiting for a rover.

Soon after that Bill & Bob landed a 2-kerbal rover so Jeb & Bill went to check out the arc. Jeb could'nt resist jet-packing up the arc to take some picture

pictures
